channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Construction material being dumped, 6th August
item.description:
There is a person who is living in a caravan, who clearly broke the barrier and collects cash every tome somebody disposes of construction waste and other things

item.title: Abandon caravan, 6th August
item.description:
The caravan appears to have been abandoned. It has been stationary for some time, with no signs of maintenance or visitation. The exterior is covered in bird droppings, and there’s no indication that anyone is looking after it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33,35, Cunard Walk, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Construction waste left and landlord not removing after job finished 2 weeks ago, 6th August
item.description:
Construction rubbish has been left in the card-park area after re-rendering of building was completed. There is now food waste which has caused a large amount of flies and the landlord who owns the property is not getting the refuse removed. The area now smells bad and we have only just got local rat infestation under control and do not want more back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree romove, 6th August
item.description:
The trees that are on council land the trees are location next to 69 garden fencing are damaging my fencing i live at 108 Prestbury Square I would like to see the trees removed from this area. Before the trees fall down and broken everything i own
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensworth Road, Elmstead, London
